Literature.Title: De novo synthetic short antimicrobial peptides against cariogenic bacteria.
Literature.Author: Wang Y, Fan Y, Zhou Z, Tu H, Ren Q, Wang X, Ding L, Zhou X, Zhang L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococcus mutans UA159(MIC=256µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans UA159(MBC=256µg/ml),Streptococcus gordonii DL1(MIC=>512µg/ml),Streptococcus gordonii DL1(MBC=>512µg/ml),Streptococcus sanguinis ATCC 10556(MIC=>512µg/ml),Streptococcus sanguinis ATCC 10556(MBC=>512µg/ml),Lactobacillus acidophilus ATCC 14931(MIC=128µg/ml),Lactobacillus acidophilus ATCC 14931(MBC=256µg/ml),Lacticaseibacillus casei ATCC 393(MIC=64µg/ml),Lacticaseibacillus casei ATCC 393(MBC=512µg/ml),Limosilactobacillus fermentum ATCC 9338 (MIC=128µg/ml),Limosilactobacillus fermentum ATCC 9338 (MBC=>512µg/ml),Actinomyces viscosus ATCC 15987(MIC=32µg/ml),Actinomyces viscosus ATCC 15987(MBC=64µg/ml),Actinomyces naeslundii ATCC 12104(MIC=128µg/ml),Actinomyces naeslundii ATCC 12104(MBC=>512µg/ml)
